com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme

Class DynamicTheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.theme.DynamicTheme
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicListener

    public class DynamicTheme
extends Object
implements DynamicListener
    Helper class to manage theme for the whole application and its activities. It must be initialized before using any activity or widget as they are heavily dependent on this class to generate colors dynamically.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static float ADS_COLOR_SHIFT_DARK_DEFAULT
      Default shift amount to generate the darker color.

      Dynamic theme shared preferences.
      static String ADS_PREF_THEME_KEY
      Key for the theme preference.
      static int ADS_THEME_AUTO
      Constant for the auto theme.

      void onDestroy()
      Set the initialized instance to null when app terminates for better theme results when theme is changed.
      void onDynamicChange(boolean context, boolean recreate)
      Called when the dynamic change event occurs (like theme or locale change).
      void onLocalDestroy()
      Set the initialized instance to null when local destroys for better theme results when theme is changed.
      void onNavigationBarThemeChange()
      Called when the navigation bar theme has been changed.
      void recreateLocal()
      Recreate local activity to update all the views with new theme.

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        public DynamicTheme attach(@NonNull
                           Context localContext)
        Attach a local context to this theme. It can be an activity in case different themes are required for different activities.
        Parameters:
        localContext - The context to be attached with this theme.
        Returns:
        The DynamicTheme object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

      • initializeInstance

        public static void initializeInstance(@Nullable
                                      Context context)
        Initialize theme when application starts. Must be initialized once.
        Parameters:
        context - The context to retrieve resources.

      • getInstance

        public static DynamicTheme getInstance()
        Get instance to access public methods. Must be called before accessing methods.
        Returns:
        The singleton instance of this class.

      • setTheme

        public DynamicTheme setTheme(@StyleRes
                             int theme,
                             boolean initializeRemoteColors)
        Initialize colors form the supplied theme resource.
        Parameters:
        theme - The theme resource to initialize colors.
        initializeRemoteColors - true to initialize remote colors also.
        Returns:
        The DynamicTheme object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

      • setLocalTheme

        public DynamicTheme setLocalTheme(@StyleRes
                                  int localTheme)
        Initialize colors form the supplied local theme resource.
        Parameters:
        localTheme - The local theme resource to initialize colors.
        Returns:
        The DynamicTheme object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

      • initializeColors

        public DynamicTheme initializeColors()
        Initialize other colors according to the base colors. They can be set individually by calling the appropriate functions.
        Returns:
        The DynamicTheme object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

      • initializeLocalColors

        public DynamicTheme initializeLocalColors()
        Initialize other local colors according to the base local colors. They can be set individually by calling the appropriate functions.
        Returns:
        The DynamicTheme object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

      • initializeRemoteColors

        public DynamicTheme initializeRemoteColors(boolean reset)
        Initialize remote colors according to the base colors. They can be set individually by calling the appropriate functions.
        Parameters:
        reset - true to reset the previously set remote colors.
        Returns:
        The DynamicTheme object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

        public int getColorFromType(int colorType)

        Parameters:
        colorType - The color type to be retrieved.
        Returns:

        public DynamicTheme setBackgroundColor(int backgroundColor,
                                       boolean generateTint)
        Set the background color used by the application.
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - The background color to be set.
        generateTint - true to automatically generate the tint color also.

        See Also:
        setTintBackgroundColor(int)

        Returns:
        The DynamicTheme object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.

      • recreateLocal

        public void recreateLocal()
        Recreate local activity to update all the views with new theme.

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        Set the initialized instance to null when app terminates for better theme results when theme is changed.

      • onLocalDestroy

        public void onLocalDestroy()
        Set the initialized instance to null when local destroys for better theme results when theme is changed.

      • getDefaultContrastWith

        public int getDefaultContrastWith()
        Returns:
        The default contrast with color to tint the background aware views accordingly.

      • onNavigationBarThemeChange

        public void onNavigationBarThemeChange()
        Description copied from interface: DynamicListener
        Called when the navigation bar theme has been changed.
        Specified by:
        onNavigationBarThemeChange in interface DynamicListener

      • onDynamicChange

        public void onDynamicChange(boolean context,
                            boolean recreate)
        Description copied from interface: DynamicListener
        Called when the dynamic change event occurs (like theme or locale change). Re-create the activity or application here to adapt changes.
        Specified by:
        onDynamicChange in interface DynamicListener
        Parameters:
        context - true if there is a context change and it must be reinitialized.
        recreate - true if listener must be recreated to adapt the changes.
